snippet: The prime minister of India has a complicated past with Muslims, who make up a majority of the troubled region. So an uneventful campaign stop came as a surprise.
abstract: Indian Prime Min Narendra Modi gives routine campaign speech at rally in Srinagar in Kashmir without serious incident; event comes as surprise given Modi's complicated past with Muslims, who make up majority in region.

byline.contributor: Hari Kumar contributed reporting from Srinagar, India.

lead_paragraph: The prime minister of India has a complicated past with Muslims, who make up a majority of the troubled region. So an uneventful campaign stop came as a surprise.

headline.main: Modi’s Campaign Stop in Kashmir Is Notable for Lack of Unrest
headline.print_headline: Modi’s Campaign Stop in Kashmir Is Notable for Lack of Unrest
